name: Command Centre: Ifrit
description:
Ever wanted to control your very own spaceship? maneuver around asteroids? strategically maintain your own spaceship?

Play Command Centre : Ifrit where you are stationed as the commander and pilot of your very own space ship. Survive for long enough to reach your destination, while managing power levels, temperature and fuel!

Features:

1) Manage Power levels in your space ship and distribute it strategically.

2) Maintain a stable internal temperature to not hinder your energy levels.

3) Maneuver around meteors to avoid being hit.

4) survive for long enough to reach your target destination! 

--------------

Command Centre : Ifrit is my entry to the NEOC game jam, and my third published game, as well as my third game jam. Hope y'all like it!

P.S. Don't forget to check out the help screen!
